tool_description: Hassle free translation and localization for your business.  One Hour Translation API exposes various methods and services delivered by One Hour Translation and allows external systems to securely launch, monitor and communicate with translation jobs
name: OneHourTranslation
title: OneHourTranslation

api_list.name: Download Resource
api_list.description: Return a “file download” response, not JSON. See here. File is downloaded with original name, text content is downloaded with file name: “oht_<resource_uuid>.txt”

api_list.name: Get Account Details
api_list.description: Fetch basic account details and credits balance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-onehourtranslation.p.rapidapi.com/account"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-onehourtranslation.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
